original_text: But what remains of the flesh of the sacrifice on the third day shall be burned up with fire.
korean_text: 그 제물의 고기가 셋째 날까지 남았으면 불사를지니

sentences.original_text: But what remains of the flesh of the sacrifice
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제물의 고기 중 남은 것은

sentences.original_text: shall be burned up with fire.
